title: My biggest gripe with URF...
body:
... is that you didn't make all skills free, which is hand-in-hand why the game mode is fun.

If certain skills required a bunch of mana and you could only cast them a handful of times before you ran out of mana, Urf would be meaningless.

So can we make ALL the skills in the game free for Urf? ALL of them, not more than there are now.  ALL of them.
